definitions.title: standard, banner
definitions.body: (As. diglu Dl:HA 40 Pr 58; cf. also Di Nu 2:2); cstr. [[דֶּגֶל]] Nu 2:3 + 7 t.; sf. [[דִּגְלוֹ]] Nu 1:52 + 2 t.; pl. sf. [[דִּגְלֵיהֶם]] Nu 2:17, Nu 2:31, Nu 2:34; —standard, partic. of separate tribes of Isr. [[מחנה יהודה]] ´[[ד]] etc. Nu 2:3, Nu 2:10, Nu 2:18, Nu 2:25, Nu 10:14, Nu 10:18, Nu 10:22, Nu 10:25; cf. also Nu 1:52, Nu 2:2 (‖[[אׂתׂת]]) v:Nu 2:17, v:Nu 2:31, v:Nu 2:34 (all P.); fig. Ct So 2:4 [[ודגלו עלי אהבה]].
